autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, thinking they were solely due to my own hard work and determination rather than God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in personal projects , hobbies , or leisure activities
solely to my own efforts and determination
autonomy.question: Did I attribute my accomplishments in personal projects, hobbies, or leisure activities solely to my own efforts and determination, forgetting that God's providence was at work in me?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in situations where I should have exercised more restraint , possibly using language that was hurtful or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others in situations where I should have exercised more restraint, possibly using language that was hurtful or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating , drinking , or other pleasures
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating, drinking, or other pleasures to an excessive degree?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: without sufficient consideration for their impact on my spiritual well - being
for their impact on my spiritual well - being
gluttony.question: Have I used eating and drinking excessively, to an unreasonable degree, and without sufficient consideration for their impact on my spiritual well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true among friends, family, or community members?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults through conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults through conversations, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you unnecessarily engage in work on a Sunday, failing to observe this holy day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
